column3: Latest; Phnom Penh: A group of around 10 Chinese people went to the Chinese Commerce Office ------(------Consulate------)------ to ask for intervention with a Chinese company Liang Guang Som . The incident occurred at 9:40 pm on December 30
column9: they have problems with China’s Liang Guang Som company and asked the commerce office help solve a dispute over unpaid salaries.------By 10.20  on the same morning
column10: 7 people left for the Chinese Embassy
column11: while 3 Chinese nationals remained behind with their luggage.------ TDN
